input.sentences: the sun is going down over the horizon .
it 's dark out and they go for some food .
the fried dough stand looks appealing .
also there is some kettle corn available .
the city lights up in the darkness .
output.sentences: The sun spilt over the horizon.
Many people ate food watching the dark sky.
The fried dough stand had lots of business.
The kettle corn stand was busy too.
The darkness in the sky made it easy to see the lights from the city.
